Package com.saguaro.entity

Class Role

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saguaro.entity.Role
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority
    @Entity
public class Role
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority
    This class implements a Role entity, and is used by Hibernate to generate a corresponding database representation. This class additionally implements the GrantedAuthority interface, allowing Roles to be used to authorize access to protected resources by Spring.

    Every user is by default given the ROLE_USER role on registration.

    Author:
    Charles Wong
    See Also:

      • getAuthority

        public java.lang.String getAuthority()
        Returns a string representation of the authorities this role grants. This is synonymous with the name of this role for Saguaro.
        Specified by:
        getAuthority in interface org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority

        a String representation of the authorities this role grants

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)
        Compares an object against this role. The object being compared is equal to this Role if and only if it is a Role with the same non-null ID and name.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - an Object to compare against
        Returns:
        true if the object being compared is equal to this object, false otherwise
